relationships.label: Implements
relationships.definition: Directly realizes or fulfills an upstream requirement

relationships.label: Derives From
relationships.definition: Logically follows from or is based on upstream element
examples: Physical procedure derives from Logical standard
Operational runbook derives from Component deployment

relationships.label: Constrained By
relationships.definition: Bounded or limited by upstream constraint or boundary
examples: Physical implementation constrained by Logical policy
Component config constrained by trust boundary

relationships.label: Refines
relationships.definition: Adds implementation detail to upstream element

relationships.label: Validates
relationships.definition: Provides verification or proof of upstream element
